content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ the **snowy wheat stitch™ crochet ornament** is a perfect blend of creativity and heartwarming charm **the ad-free pdf also comes with an ornament sizing guide to use any yarn or size ornament ** if you re looking for a delightful crochet project that s as fun to make as it is beautiful this bauble is for you with its soft textured puff stitches this ornament brings cozy charm to any tree or garland even beginners can whip these up quickly making them a fantastic option for handmade gifts straight from the heart these irresistible ornaments are incredibly quick and easy to create and will bring joy and cheer to your holiday season first we will create a textured fabric by crocheting back and forth in row then we will join our edges to form a tube insert an ornament and cinch the bottom and top shut don t worry about getting stuck - a full video tutorial is included crochet hook g+/7 4 5mm 1 - or size to meet gauge notions removable stitch marker 2 yarn needle to weave in ends 3 scissors 4 flattened round 3 15 in 5 small round 2 36 in 6 medium round 3 15 in 7 large round 3 94 in 8 square shape 3 94 in 9 yarn brava worsted 10 100 % premium acrylic 218yds/100g or lion brand color theory 11 100% acrylic 246yds/100g yardage approximately 40-75 yds total per ornament yarn substitutions mighty stitch 12 80% acrylic 20% superwash wool 208yds/100g swish dk 13 100% fine superwash merino wool 110yds/50g heatherly sport 14 80% acrylic 20% merino wool 328yds/100g abbreviations blo - back loop only chain - chain rs - right side slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet st s - stitch es ws - wrong side gauge 17 sts x 12 row = 4 x4 in stitch pattern repeat not blocked not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 15 five sizes pattern includes directions for five different ornament diameters -
